channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m a 25-year-old founder who loves robots but too many humanoids are militant and creepy-looking. Things need to change—just look at Elon Musk
item.description: Who’s raising our robots? Teaching social norms in the age of humanoid robots.

item.title: When the Cold Turns Deadly, What Should New York City Do?
item.description: Seventeen New Yorkers have died after exposure to frigid temperatures since Jan. 24, raising questions about how Mayor Zohran Mamdani has managed the ...

item.title: Options traders pile into tech hedges after software rout
item.description: “The question is how low do you go?” said Michael Bailey of FBB Capital Partners. “Investors hate software, that’s pretty clear.”

item.title: Primary for New Jersey Seat Is First House Race in Pivotal Year
item.description: Eleven candidates are running in a special primary election on Thursday to fill Gov. Mikie Sherrill’s former seat. They include a former member of Con...

item.title: Michael Lewis reveals he’s got a deal to write the Sam Altman book—when ChatGPT is ready to write a rival draft
item.description: Altman admitted over dinner that ChatGPT wasn't nearly advanced enough, Lewis claimed. "He said, it'd be a really bad book."

item.title: Trump is giving the U.S. economy a $65 billion tax-refund shot in the arm, mostly for higher-income people, BofA says
item.description: "The consumer divide is about to get deeper," BofA's senior U.S. economist Aditya Bhave wrote on Wednesday.

item.title: Trump Brings Out the Worst in Everyone
How Hochul Improved Her Prospects and Hurt an Adversary Along the Way
item.description: Gov. Kathy Hochul of New York has warded off most challenges to her re-election, but still faces one from her own deputy, Lt. Gov. Antonio Delgado.

item.title: What to Know About the Disappearance of Savannah Guthrie’s Mom, Nancy
item.description: Nancy Guthrie, 84, the “Today” show host’s mother, was last seen on Saturday night, the authorities said. The disappearance is being investigated as a...

item.title: OpenAI announces Frontier, an AI agent platform for enterprises to power apps like Salesforce and Workday—but could it eventually replace them?
item.description: OpenAI’s new enterprise platform lets companies build and manage agents that sit on top of existing software, blurring the line between partner and co...

item.title: Iranian Nobel Peace Laureate Starts New Hunger Strike in Prison
item.description: The rights activist Narges Mohammadi is protesting her continued detention, her family said. She was arrested again in December after being given leav...

item.title: Venezuela Said to Detain Maduro Allies Targeted by the U.S.
item.description: The questioning of the politically connected businessmen, Raúl Gorrín and Alex Saab, signaled deepening cooperation between the two nations.

item.title: Deaths in Boat Disaster in English Channel Were Avoidable, Inquiry Finds
item.description: The report blamed people smugglers and “systemic failure” on the part of the authorities after about 30 people drowned as they tried to reach Britain ...

item.title: In Afghanistan, a Trail of Hunger and Death Behind U.S. Aid Cuts
item.description: Afghanistan has plunged deeper into a crisis marked by levels of child hunger unseen in 25 years and the closure of almost 450 health centers.

item.title: ‘My Crazy Friend’: The Royals Who Stayed Close to Epstein
